title: Snowflake Cortex AI Functions for Call Center Transcript Analysis
description: Explore how to leverage Snowflake Cortex for large language model (LLM) capabilities directly within Snowflake.
author: Douglas Day

title: Snowflake Cortex Analyst for Stock Trading Analyssis
description: Create interactive data applications using Streamlit and connect to Snowflake. Explore how to build and deploy simple dashboards.
author: Douglas Day

title: Building a dbt Project on Snowflake
description: Understand how to transform data in Snowflake using dbt. This lab guides you through setting up and running your first dbt models.
author: De Wet Conradie

title: Machine Learning with Snowpark
description: Explore building and deploying machine learning models directly in Snowflake with Snowpark. A deep dive into in-database ML.

title: Introduction to Data Governance in Snowflake
description: Learn about data governance features like masking policies and row access policies to secure your data in Snowflake.

title: Connecting Power BI to Snowflake
description: Integrate Snowflake with Power BI for powerful data visualization and reporting. Learn to connect and build dashboards.
